content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of our conversation was the rental price of my apartment, which is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] We did not agree on a final price. The tenant's highest offer was 875 Euros, and I was asking for 875 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement with the tenant? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I would rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement with the tenant as a 5. The tenant was persistent and had a clear budget, but we were unable to agree on a price that satisfied us both.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Response] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
